sections.heading: district; employees; removal.No regular appointee or employee of the metropolitan utilities district, except the individual appointed in section 14-2109, who has been in its service consecutively for more than one year shall be subject to removal except upon a two-thirds vote of the full board and t
sections.text: district; employees; removal.No regular appointee or employee of the metropolitan utilities district, except the individual appointed in section 14-2109, who has been in its service consecutively for more than one year shall be subject to removal except upon a two-thirds vote of the full board and then only for cause which shall be stated in writing and filed with the secretary of the board at least ten days prior to a hearing preceding such removal.SourceLaws 1913, c. 143, § 14, p. 356;R.S.1913, § 4256;Laws 1919, c. 33, § 3, p. 108;C.S.1922, § 3759;C.S.1929, § 14-1015;Laws 1941, c. 20, § 1, p. 110;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 14-1015;Laws 1943, c. 38, § 1(1), p. 180;R.S.1943, § 14-1021;R.S.1943, (1991), § 14-1021;Laws 1992, LB 746, § 10;Laws 2007, LB207, § 2;Laws 2013, LB208, § 2.
